title: Open Source Developer Compensation Models
description: Explore various compensation models for open source developers, including sponsorships, donations, corporate partnerships, bounties, dual licensing, support services, crowdfunding, and marketplace sales. Discover strategies to sustain open source projects financially while fostering community collaboration.
keywords: open source, developer compensation, sponsorships, donations, corporate sponsorships, bounties, grants, dual licensing, support services, consulting, crowdfunding, marketplace sales, open source sustainability
